text: @adamdriver85 That is seriously rubbish! Keep drinking ginger, lemon, manuka honey & hot water. And rest. Don’t muck around with tonsillitis - it’s really horrid. Take care Adam!

@wadds @learock76 @ITV You’re welcome and look forward to your thoughts on it. I’ll order the book - it’s good to see the best & worst of any profession … think it helps us not only determine which path we want to take but also why!
@wadds @learock76 @ITV The techniques & tools are undoubtedly linked to publicity & lobbying. But the individuals doing it cannot & should not be associated with professionalism & ethical principles.

Listen to the anger & sadness of this caller. 

When I think about the person in the jungle trying to be a celeb, I only think of these characteristics: 

Corrupt. Greedy. Ignorant. Arrogant. Incompetent. Vile. 

And similar for the team @ITV who allowed this show to happen. https://t.co/LS9qj5UDS4

@RodCartwright Oh jammer Skat … now I’m going to have to increase your friendship fees!
Wow! Faf de Klerk just incredible 🏉🇿🇦 kick to secure further lead in the #AutumnNationsSeries #ENGvsRSA … go Bokke @Springboks
@RodCartwright A perfect way to spend the evening under African skies! I’m not jealous at all!

Loving your 🏉🏟️ work #bokke @Springboks #EngVsRSA #AutumnNationsSeries

I’m emerging slowly & gently from Covid 😷. What a ride, eh?
I’ve used the time to watch some exceptional TV documentaries & films about important historical events. 
Also observed a rollercoaster of emotions on Twitter about world events.
Humanity & respect keeps winning.

Some very cool roles being advertised on @comms2point0 this week … if you’re looking make sure you’re following. 

PS I’ve not been paid to say this.
@KateBurkeNHS The most beautiful thing we can do is be ourselves & cheer each other on (summoning the Crows and Chaos and Single Socks and Everything!)
@CrowtherSim That’ll learn you!

@PaulMBigland @CrowtherSim @HS2ltd So we can’t claim it’s a vanity project NOW … means that it was a vanity project THEN invented by the original players BUT they’ve moved on now, so 🤷🏼‍♀️ … anyhow it’s 2022

@wadds The combination of these points:
- some agencies have four generations working in them 
- more than 50% of women have experienced sexual abuse in the workplace 

Makes me think 🤔 what goes on in these families or what they’re prepared to overlook?

@PaulMBigland @CrowtherSim The fact is I didn’t say stop it; I stated that I don’t favour it. Another fact is, you assume to know what I do & don’t understand. But having attended many consultations about it, apart from reading into its governance, I learned how money follows ego & vanity. Simples.

@DrPragyaAgarwal Years ago I convinced my then toddler (who refused to eat potato in any form) that gnocchi was just white sausages. 

He’s now 17 & still loves gnocchi. He will eat skinny fries. But does his best to avoid mash, roasties, & baked potatoes 🤷🏼‍♀️
This woman @CoconutKelz makes me feel homesick sometimes 🤣🤣🤣 https://t.co/QD7koS5Dq2

@CrowtherSim It’s carnage across the countryside … I’ve never been in favour of #HS2 because it never made sense to solve a capacity problem with faster trains. All the while the existing network is creaking & costs a small fortune to use (if it works at all).

We've partnered with @CIPR_Global to deliver a piece of work aimed at hel…
@MallikaBasu_ Excellent 👌🏻 work! Sucks the oxygen out of their world. They don’t matter. You do!

@sharonodea Customers feel seen & get excited to interact with the brand. Change (in structure, people etc) isn’t met with friction. Productivity increases. Confidence grows to communicate often & well.

@sharonodea A mature & safe culture - little or no fear of consequences - nurtures & encourages respectful, fair feedback on policies, processes, systems etc. The workforce feel able to be critical friends to each other - innovate, create, embrace failure thru open reviews & discussion.

@Padsky @jfwduffield This is why I love the rugby family. I was at a game earlier today; the banter and respectful discourse between opposing sides is what makes the game. We all want our players to be safe.
@Padsky @jfwduffield I agree with your assessment of clear outs. So many moving bodies with momentum in the air - it’s terrifying to watch at any level.

@Padsky @jfwduffield It was shocking - any injury to the head particularly in rugby turns my body cold. But I didn’t see it the same way as you. He seems to have been pushed forward accelerating his momentum. I’m unsure about the red card 🤔
